algorithm_technique: Simulate the process second by second, using queues to manage people waiting to enter/exit and applying priority rules.
problem_summary_simple: Determine when each person crosses a door based on arrival time and entry/exit preferences.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate time progression, manage entry/exit queues, and apply priority rules (exit first if idle, previous action, or index) to decide who crosses.
key_insights: The problem requires a careful simulation of events over time.
Maintaining separate queues for people wanting to enter and exit is essential.
The state of the door (idle, previous entry, previous exit) dictates the priority when multiple people are waiting.
